Name Peter James Chalmers ("Jim")
Address 534 Erewhon, Pleasantville, Vic, 3999
Contacts Home: unknown. Work: (03) 5555 6473
Id MRN: 12345 (Acme Healthcare)

x-codeSamples.label: cURL
javascript Axios

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: Multiple Resources: Patient: A server defined search that may match any of the string fields in the Address, including line, city, district, state, country, postalCode, and/or text Person: A server defined search that may match any of the string fields in the Address, including line, city, district, state, country, postalCode, and/or text Practitioner: A server defined search that may match any of the string fields in the Address, including line, city, district, state, country, postalCode, and/or text RelatedPerson: A server defined search that may match any of the string fields in the Address, including line, city, district, state, country, postalCode, and/or text

parameters.name: address-city
parameters.description: Multiple Resources: Patient: A city specified in an address Person: A city specified in an address Practitioner: A city specified in an address RelatedPerson: A city specified in an address

parameters.name: address-country
parameters.description: Multiple Resources: Patient: A country specified in an address Person: A country specified in an address Practitioner: A country specified in an address RelatedPerson: A country specified in an address

parameters.name: address-postalcode
parameters.description: Multiple Resources: Patient: A postalCode specified in an address Person: A postal code specified in an address Practitioner: A postalCode specified in an address RelatedPerson: A postal code specified in an address

parameters.name: address-state
parameters.description: Multiple Resources: Patient: A state specified in an address Person: A state specified in an address Practitioner: A state specified in an address RelatedPerson: A state specified in an address

parameters.name: address-use
parameters.description: Multiple Resources: Patient: A use code specified in an address Person: A use code specified in an address Practitioner: A use code specified in an address RelatedPerson: A use code specified in an address

parameters.name: birthdate
parameters.description: Multiple Resources: Patient: The patient's date of birth Person: The person's date of birth RelatedPerson: The Related Person's date of birth

parameters.name: email
parameters.description: Multiple Resources: Patient: A value in an email contact Person: A value in an email contact Practitioner: A value in an email contact PractitionerRole: A value in an email contact RelatedPerson: A value in an email contact

parameters.name: family
parameters.description: Multiple Resources: Patient: A portion of the family name of the patient Practitioner: A portion of the family name

parameters.name: gender
parameters.description: Multiple Resources: Patient: Gender of the patient Person: The gender of the person Practitioner: Gender of the practitioner RelatedPerson: Gender of the related person

parameters.name: given
parameters.description: Multiple Resources: Patient: A portion of the given name of the patient Practitioner: A portion of the given name

parameters.name: phone
parameters.description: Multiple Resources: Patient: A value in a phone contact Person: A value in a phone contact Practitioner: A value in a phone contact PractitionerRole: A value in a phone contact RelatedPerson: A value in a phone contact

parameters.name: phonetic
parameters.description: Multiple Resources: Patient: A portion of either family or given name using some kind of phonetic matching algorithm Person: A portion of name using some kind of phonetic matching algorithm Practitioner: A portion of either family or given name using some kind of phonetic matching algorithm RelatedPerson: A portion of name using some kind of phonetic matching algorithm

parameters.name: telecom
parameters.description: Multiple Resources: Patient: The value in any kind of telecom details of the patient Person: The value in any kind of contact Practitioner: The value in any kind of contact PractitionerRole: The value in any kind of contact RelatedPerson: The value in any kind of contact

parameters.name: active
parameters.description: Whether the patient record is active

parameters.name: deceased
parameters.description: This patient has been marked as deceased, or as a death date entered

parameters.name: general-practitioner
parameters.description: Patient's nominated general practitioner, not the organization that manages the record

parameters.name: identifier
parameters.description: A patient identifier

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: Language code (irrespective of use value)

parameters.name: link
parameters.description: All patients linked to the given patient

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: A server defined search that may match any of the string fields in the HumanName, including family, give, prefix, suffix, suffix, and/or text

parameters.name: organization
parameters.description: The organization that is the custodian of the patient record
